name: The Sims 3
description: Significantly improves performance by utilizing Vulkan
notes:
- If Steam is stuck at installing VC Redist, remove "_install.vdf" files inside game's steam folder.
- This installer automatically adds ErrorTrap and Overwatch mods by nRaas to improve game's stability. Remove if you experience issues, but it's highly suggested to leave them.

task.name: set_regedit
task.description: Setting version to XP for Sims3LauncherW...

content:
files:
- d9vk:
    filename: d9vk-master.58669173dd95f00e800ce28f3caf03dd18512426.zip
    url: https://git.froggi.es/joshua/d9vk/-/jobs/456/artifacts/download
game:
  appid: 47890
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-58669173/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    command: ln -s "$GAMEDIR/prefix" "$CACHE/prefix"
- task:
    app: dotnet20 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting version to XP for Sims3LauncherW...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Sims3LauncherW.exe
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting version to 7 for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: win7
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-58669173
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
